channel.title: NPCHandler errors?
channel.description:
When i went to compile and start server up, i get:
server.java:42: error: cannot find symbol public static NPCHandler npcHandler = null; ^ symbol: class NPCHandler location: class server Player.java:571: error: cannot find symbol public final static int maxNPCListSize = NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns; ^ symbol: variable NPCHandler location: class Player Player.java:740: error: cannot find symbol public byte npcInListBitmap[] = new byte[(NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns + 7) > > 3]; ^ symbol: variable NPCHandler location: class Player PlayerHandler.java:409: error: cannot find symbol for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) { ^ symbol: variable NPCHandler location: class PlayerHandler server.java:111: error: cannot find symbol npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ^ symbol: class NPCHandler location: class server 5 errors The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
Any suggestions?

item.title: NPCHandler errors?
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Going on a hunch, but maybe you need to import NPCHandler. I recommend using an IDE to put a stop to things like this. Eclipse in case you are interested.

Read full topic

item.title: NPCHandler errors?
item.dc:creator: @jaker101 jaker101
item.description:
@jaker101 wrote:

When i went to compile and start server up, i get:

server.java:42: error: cannot find symbol
public static NPCHandler npcHandler = null;
^
symbol: class NPCHandler
location: class server
Player.java:571: error: cannot find symbol
public final static int maxNPCListSize = NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns;
^
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class Player
Player.java:740: error: cannot find symbol
public byte npcInListBitmap[] = new byte[(NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns + 7) >

3];
^
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class Player
PlayerHandler.java:409: error: cannot find symbol
for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
^
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class PlayerHandler
server.java:111: error: cannot find symbol
npcHandler = new NPCHandler();
^
symbol: class NPCHandler
location: class server
5 errors
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

Any suggestions?
